cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A quick reference to Github CLI, an open-source command line tool that enables GitHub on your terminal.

cards.title: Installation
cards.back: `winget install --id Github.cli` | `winget upgrade --id GitHub.cli`

cards.title: Installation
cards.back: `scoop install gh` | `scoop update gh`

cards.title: Installation
cards.back: `choco install gh` | `choco upgrade gh`

cards.title: Installation
cards.back: `brew install gh` | `brew upgrade gh`

cards.title: Installation
cards.back: `sudo port install gh` | `sudo port selfupdate && sudo port upgrade gh`

cards.title: Installation
cards.body:
See the [install instructions](https://github.com/cli/cli/blob/trunk/docs/install_linux.md) for other Linux
distributions.

cards.title: Installation
cards.code:
type -p curl >/dev/null || (sudo apt update && sudo apt install curl -y)
curl -fsSL https://cli.github.com/packages/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg | sudo dd of=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg \
&& sudo chmod go+r /usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg \
&& echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg] https://cli.github.com/packages stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/github-cli.list > /dev/null \
&& sudo apt update \
&& sudo apt install gh -y

cards.title: Basic Usage
cards.back: Help provides help for any command in the application. Simply type gh help [path to command] for full details.

cards.title: Issues
cards.back: Search for issues on GitHub

cards.title: Issues
cards.code:
# search issues matching set of keywords "readme" and "typo"
$ gh search issues readme typo

# search issues matching phrase "broken feature"
$ gh search issues "broken feature"

# search issues and pull requests in cli organization
$ gh search issues --include-prs --owner=cli

# search open issues assigned to yourself
$ gh search issues --assignee=@me --state=open

# search issues with numerous comments
$ gh search issues --comments=">100"

# search issues without label "bug"
$ gh search issues -- -label:bug

cards.title: Pull Requests
cards.code:
Current branch
  #12 Remove the test feature [user:patch-2]
   - All checks failing - Review required

Created by you
  You have no open pull requests

Requesting a code review from you
  #13 Fix tests [branch]
  - 3/4 checks failing - Review required
  #15 New feature [branch]
   - Checks passing - Approved
